name: Tab
headline: Revolutionising the way travellers discover, plan and book a trip
description:
At Tab, we’re revolutionising the way travellers discover, plan and book a trip.

The Guide lets travellers find and book anywhere — with helpful recommendations from friends & local experts, rather than bland listings with endless reviews. Planning your trip should be a joy, not a chore! We help people to travel responsibly, by booking direct instead of using traditional booking sites. Travellers get the best price and they help local businesses avoid unnecessary fees. 

Travel experts, content creators and the friends you always ask for recommendations can use The Guide to showcase their favourite places to stay and things to do. When you book one of their recommendations, you’ll get a discount from the business and they receive bonus credit to say thanks.

The Tab platform gives independent tourism businesses the tools to improve their online presence, be discovered, take direct bookings — and also to take payments. Our payment platform is uniquely designed for tourism businesses, handling over 100 currencies natively, and every payment type securely and easily.

As travel returns after a difficult period, it’s time for a fresh approach. That’s why we’re building a social commerce platform for tourism — helping to spread the benefits of tourism far and wide, and helping travellers make the most of their precious time abroad. 

We're headquartered in London, and backed by Y Combinator (the investors behind Airbnb, Dropbox and Stripe).

founders.name: Mark Datta, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Mark worked in the finance industry, and at travel and fintech startups before founding Tab. He has an MBA from Harvard Business School.

# Take payments easily, and get more direct bookings
With Payments by Tab, we help you to easily charge guest credit and debit cards in advance and in-person, with free payouts in your preferred currency. The Guide helps travellers to find your business and book direct, with no booking commission fees. 
[Learn More](https://www.tab.travel/<#payments-by-tab>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394056d54b5a8033fd50c3/604a59a468016c08f5f147b3_Home%20-%20Hero.png)
Available globally
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394056d54b5a8033fd50c3/60394057d54b5a1173fd5146_Handwriting%20Arrow%20Black.svg)
Over 50,000 tourism businesses trust the Tab platform to generate direct bookings and take payments — including hotels, tour & activity operators, and restaurants.
###### 1. Payments by Tab
### Take payments easily in advance and in-person
Using Payments by Tab, you can easily accept international payments in advance and in-person, with free payouts direct to your bank account in any currency.
[Read More ➞](https://www.tab.travel/</payments>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394056d54b5a8033fd50c3/6048f960e1c94f3102ce8b7a_Home%20-%20Payments.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394056d54b5a8033fd50c3/6048ea96387b798bebe1bde4_Booking%20Flow.png)
###### 2. Checkout Flow
### End-to-end direct bookings on your website and in The Guide
NEW
Never miss another booking through your website. Offer a seamless booking and checkout experience for your valued guests.
[Read More ➞](https://www.tab.travel/</checkout-flow>)
###### 3. The Guide
### Let millions of travellers find you direct
The Guide helps travellers find your business and book direct, with suggestions from friends & local experts. Built using the local knowledge of independent tourism businesses, The Guide makes booking direct with no commission fees the new normal.
[Read More ➞](https://www.tab.travel/</the-guide>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394056d54b5a8033fd50c3/6048f760b9b9754080b61e50_Profiles%20with%20Personality%20\(3\).png)
### The Platform for Tourism Businesses
#### Easy to Start
Join The Guide today or apply for your Payments by Tab account in just 10 minutes.
#### No Commitment
No new hardware needed. There's no long-term contract or commitment, so you can cancel anytime.
#### We're here to help
Our multi-timezone team will guide you through every step of the process, and we're always here to help.
###### Meet The Businesses
### Businesses love using Tab
Trusted by thousands of businesses – see what some of them had to say about us!
[Read Case Studies ➞](https://www.tab.travel/</case-studies>)
[ Juan CarlosOwner"With Tab, payment processing has become seamless, saving us hours of manual work each week and allowing us to focus more on curating exceptional tours."](https://www.tab.travel/</case-studies/bukap>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394057d54b5a5677fd50ce/6724d5e62dd41914ef7864f1_pto.%20engabao%20encuentro%20de%20condiciones%20magicas.JPG)AnabelOwner, Free Spirit Hostel "We can now take card payments, which we couldn't before."](https://www.tab.travel/</case-studies/free-spirit-hostel-ecuador>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394057d54b5a5677fd50ce/66f18887fd50a6eeed996b5b_DSC_6767%20\(1\).jpg)ChristianOwner, Soho Rentals Apartments"Tab has been a total game changer for our business. Since we started using the platform, the payment process is much more streamlined, efficient and transparent."](https://www.tab.travel/</case-studies/soho-rentals-apartments>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394057d54b5a5677fd50ce/667ac58786f2a3eeacd4edc8_bromelia-pool.jpeg)TineOwner, Geckoes Lodge"Tab is an easy and hassle-free way to collect payment from your customers. The process is simple and transparent and the payouts are punctual."](https://www.tab.travel/</case-studies/geckoes-lodge>)
### Ready to start taking Payments with Tab?
Apply for an account in 10 minutes, or book a call with our team and we'll answer any questions you have.If you prefer to only add your business to The Guide for now, you can do that [here](https://www.tab.travel/</the-guide/#join-the-guide>).
[Apply Now](https://www.tab.travel/<https:/apply.tab.travel/>)[Book a Call](https://www.tab.travel/<https:/calendly.com/d/cnkj-79k-hzn>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394056d54b5a8033fd50c3/6047eaf5812c7068dd3e5fa7_Payments%20-%20Hero.png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60394056d54b5a8033fd50c3/60493d720e2a719b088ae41f_5d88f5f708e53e3d430522e3_57acacedec62b90517b24157_Tab%20Logo%20-%20Webclip%20256x256.png)](https://www.tab.travel/</>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Tab**

Tab, founded in 2015 and based in London, is on a mission to revolutionize the travel experience by changing the way people discover, plan, and book their trips. They’re tackling a common pain point: travel planning should be fun, not cumbersome. Instead of drowning in generic listings and endless reviews, travelers can use Tab’s platform, *The Guide*, to find places based on recommendations from friends and local experts. 

### Key Features:

1. **The Guide**: This feature allows travelers to easily uncover and book local businesses with trusted recommendations, ensuring that the process is as enjoyable as the journey itself. By booking directly through the platform, they not only save money but also support local businesses by avoiding traditional booking fees.

2. **Social Commerce**: Tab harnesses the power of social connections by letting travel experts and friends showcase their favorite spots. When someone books one of these recommended places, they often receive a discount, and the recommender earns a bonus.

3. **Payment Solutions**: Tab offers a robust payment platform tailored for the tourism sector, handling transactions in over 100 currencies. This service simplifies everything from direct bookings to payment collection for tourism businesses, helping them enhance their online presence and connect with customers directly.

4. **No More Commissions**: With Tab, travelers can book without incurring additional fees, and businesses can enjoy direct relationships with their customers.

Tab is backed by Y Combinator, a notable accelerator from which companies like Airbnb and Stripe emerged. This investment signals strong belief in Tab’s potential to reshape the travel industry.

### The Team and Growth:

Currently, Tab employs a small yet nimble team of nine dedicated individuals. Their size allows them to maintain agility while pursuing their goal of providing an innovative travel experience.

### Conclusion:

As travel regains its footing post-pandemic, Tab stands out with a fresh, appealing approach. By merging technology with the joys of travel exploration and local community support, they're paving the way for a new standard in travel planning. Travelers looking to make the most of their adventures should consider checking out what Tab has to offer at [tab.travel](https://www.tab.travel). 

In essence, Tab is more than a marketplace; it’s a movement aimed at bringing joy back to travel through human connections and responsible practices.
